word:
ATTENDED CAMP MEETING AT NAPA, AND DURING CLOSING MONTHS OF THE YEAR LABORED IN ST. HELENA AREA, OAKLAND, SAN FRANCISCO, CALISTOGA, AND HEALDSBURG, AND BECAME SETTLED IN HER NEW HOME, FOR WHICH SHE WAS 
                                                                           201
DEEPLY GRATEFUL.  CHRIST'S OBJECT LESSONS, TESTIMONIES ON SABBATH SCHOOL WORK, AND TESTIMONIES FOR THE CHURCH, VOL. 6, WERE PUBLISHED IN 1900.
